panels.description: Total number of engine_getBlobsV2 requests to an execution layer
panels.title: engine_getBlobsV2 requests

panels.title: engine_getBlobsV2 responses

panels.description: Percentage of engine_getBlobsV2 requests that did not receive a successful (not null) response

targets.expr:
(sum by(job)(increase(beacon_engine_getBlobsV2_requests_total{client_name=~"$client", job=~"$job", supernode=~"$nodes"}[$__interval]))
-
sum by(job)(increase(beacon_engine_getBlobsV2_responses_total{client_name=~"$client", job=~"$job", supernode=~"$nodes"}[$__interval]))) / sum by(job)(increase(beacon_engine_getBlobsV2_requests_total{client_name=~"$client", job=~"$job", supernode=~"$nodes"}[$__interval])) * 100
